item.description:
This event has been rescheduled to Thurdsay - see the site for details: http://www.oldtimebas...

The Annual Injured Workers Pharmacy Old Time Baseball Game will take place on Wednesday, August 25 at 7pm in St. Peters Field North Cambridge.

What makes the Old Time Baseball Game so special is its dazzling collections of old uniforms that represent virtually every era in baseball history. The game offers a glimpse of what it was like in the old days.

This years game is being played as a benefit for the Marley Jaye Cherella Memorial Fund.

Admission is free. Fans are asked to bring a lawn chair and camp out along the foul lines.

For more information go to www.oldtimebaseball.com
item.how_to_find_us: Natives E Mail & Coordinate with each other
item.name: Old Time Baseball Game at St. Peter's Field, North Cambridge
